text: The University of South Carolina is a public, co-educational university in Columbia, South Carolina. The university has about 44,557 students. It was founded in 1801. The current president of the university is Michael Amiridis. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Gamecocks. They have 21 varsity teams, almost all of which compete in the Southeastern Conference (SEC). In men's soccer, a sport that the SEC does not sponsor, the Gamecocks play in the Sun Belt Conference ==Other websites== *University of South Carolina's Official website *South Carolina Gamecocks' Official website Category:Southeastern Conference Category:Colleges and universities in South Carolina Category:Columbia, South Carolina Category:1801 establishments in the United States Category:1800s establishments in South Carolina
title: University of South Carolina
